channel.title: Home, Micropost on Summitt Dweller's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Home, Micropost on Summitt Dweller's Blog

item.title: elementary-school-weed-control
item.description: Went to the elementary early this evening and sprayed Weed-B-Gone around the bench and area. I hope it knocks the remaining weeds there back. There was no wind and no rain thus far, so I hope it works. -/-/-/ location: Tama, Iowa

item.title: turned-hot-water-recirc-off.html
item.description: Turned off the hot water recirc at home, and treated one plant for mites. -/-/-/ location: Toledo, IA
